Part of a cycle of wall paintings covering the nave of the church of St Mary, Pickering, North Yorks. The series was completed in the late 15th century and restored in the 19th century. Here Christ rescues souls from the jaws of Hell.
To the left of Christ ('The Light of the World') may be seen rays of light as he draws forth Adam from hell, who is still holding the apple, followed by Eve. Two devils look on helplessly behind.
